person.name: Yoon Hwan Choi
person.description: Elder Yoon Hwan Choi was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 4, 2009, at age 51. At the time of his call, he had been serving as a member of the Eighth Quorum of the Seventy in the Asia North Area. He was recently released as a counselor in the Asia North Area Presidency and currently serves as an assistant Executive Director in the Temple Department.
